name: Phantasy Star Online 2
description: It installs the Japanese launcher of the game with 64bit wine.
notes:
~You will need to download the Windows installer manually, because I can't seam to make it download from the site. There is probably something that protects from bots idk.
http://download.pso2.jp/client/PSO2_SETUP.exe

~Also don't let it download the update because you don't need the game files and they weigh more that 60gb, since the only way to play is through cloud. Just click the cloud button.

files.pso2_installer: N/A:Please select the installer for this game

task.description: Installing All Chinese, Japanese, Korean fonts and aliases
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- pso2_installer: N/A:Please select the installer for this game
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/SEGA/PHANTASYSTARONLINE2/pso2_bin/pso2launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 10 mode for Wine
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winhttp
    description: Installing WinHTTP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: cjkfonts
    description: Installing All Chinese, Japanese, Korean fonts and aliases
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: fontfix
    description: Check for broken fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- chmodx: pso2_installer
- task:
    args: --windowed
    description: Installing Phantasy Star Online 2
    executable: pso2_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  esync: true
